ModMetaData.name: Naki Race HAR Edition
ModMetaData.author: Seioch
ModMetaData.description:
========== Info ========== Naki mod for Humanoid Alien Races and Rimworld 1.4
Mod dependencies (in this specific order!): 1. Humanoid Alien Races 2. This Mod
Load [KV] Show Hair With Hats or Hide All Hats to see Naki hair with their hats!
